name: Pyra's Soda Mini-game V1.1
description:
WARNING: Contains belly stuffing and expansion fetish content.

Hello! Here is another mini-game, this time featuring Pyra from Xenoblade Chronicles 2 in a swimsuit. Bring her soda and she'll chug it quickly, most of the time anyways.

UPDATE 1.1:
- Sound effects have been added.
- Pyra's swimsuit now breaks
- Fixed a bug you probably didn't notice

Controls:
R to restart
Click and hold the left mouse button to grab the cola bottles on the left.
Bottles that are falling can't be re-grabbed.
Drag the bottle to Pyra's mouth to have her drink it.
Left click Pyra's belly to bounce it and shake up the carbonation (helpful if you're here primarily for the burps).
Hold down the left mouse button and drag the mouse across Pyra's belly to rub it and settle the carbonation (and cause burping).
If Pyra's belly is too shaken up, she'll burp instead of drinking the soda, knocking it away.
There is a max size, though it may be difficult to notice when that point is reached.

Artwork by ExplodCode on DeviantArt, and used with permission. Check out his art here: https://www.deviantart.com/explodcode
